lines.text: "You hid the money in the Port-a-Johnny!"
"You know those things are damn near indestructable. Come nuclear holocaust, there will be two things left in this world... cockroaches, and god damned portable shithouses!"
You don't vote in my revolution.
I used to be a prince.
Your oldest son is half an hour late.
He was three weeks late being born.
I didn't think it was funny then, either.
You are like some stray dog I never should have fed.
Rupert Marshetta, where have you been all year?
The Bahamas, what does it look like?
Well, you can't come in here unless you're dressed from Dallas or Dynasty.
We offend the common rabble with our truth.
Most of the time you're in a fantasy world, Rupert.
Most of the time, you're stoned.
